content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Assistive technology rooms are bookable spaces that provide access to assistive technology and hardware to support your studies. Please visit Enhanced Library Support for information about services for disabled students and students with a learning difficulty or long-term health condition. Have you used our Assistive Technology Rooms or Enhanced Support Rooms? Share your thoughts and help us improve our service with our feedback form. Assistive Technology Rooms can be booked using Click and Study. A range of assistive software is available to all students via the University network.
